data.title: Introduction to the Ninja Coffee Bar™

data.title: Priming your Ninja Coffee Bar™
data.description:
For best results, it is important to prime and flush your Ninja Coffee Bar™ before you brew your first pot. 

For more information, visit http://bit.ly/2cQl07J

data.title: Introducing the Ninja Coffee Bar® System
data.description:
The Ninja Coffee Bar System now offers five brew types in six different size options, and also features a built-in frother. A better than a coffeehouse experience, at home. 

Learn more about the Ninja Coffee Bar System at NinjaCoffeeBar.com

data.title: Specialty Brew on the Ninja Coffee Bar™
data.description:
Making a concentrated amount of coffee perfect for hot, layered specialty drinks like cappuccinos or frozen blended specialty drinks, using the Specialty Brew function.

Learn more about the Ninja Coffee Bar™ at http://www.ninjacoffeebar.com. 

Get recipes for your Ninja Coffee Bar at http://www.ninjakitchen.com/recipes.
